Left 4 Dead's a pretty cool game, I recommend it to zombie lovers out there. Not as good as Left 4 Dead 2 in my opinion..

This game like it's sequel is so repetitive and can become boring fast without friends or other people to play with! The helicopter light at the beginning of No Mercy is black! Fix that bug! Also there is a flashing black light where the crashed helicopter is in the campaign Crash Course! Valve you better fix that S%&T right now!!! To many stupid bugs in this game! Fix the particles! I still prefer and highly recommend this game over the sequel as I like the atmosphere and game mechanics and zombie roster here much more even when the sequel has all the campaigns from this game! This one just feels a lot more balanced than the sequel with the lack of melee weapons and lack of special zombie types. I prefer the weapon designs in this game and feel the guns are too close to your face in the sequel.

Zombies and you get to kill them, lol ,whats not to like? One of the origional zombie killing games and still one of the best out there! Molotov cocktails, pipe bombs, sniper rifles, pistols, uzi's ,m15's, shotguns. As well as gas cans & air canistors, all help to blow them to piecies. Great , good old ,holesome fun! Lol, the AI's not bad either. The team mates can be a bid of a pain, but, their not the worst AI team mates i've ever experienced in a game, in fact their one of the better ones. A classic everyone should have if they love zombie blasting!
